title: Add React.lazy for widget components
description: All widgets loaded upfront. Could lazy-load less-used widgets.
acceptance_criteria:
- Identify widgets for lazy loading
- Implement React.lazy
- Loading fallback for each
notes: Next.js already provides route-based code splitting. Widget components are small and loaded together on the dashboard. React.lazy would require significant architecture changes for minimal benefit. Consider for v2 if bundle size becomes an issue.
close_reason: Deferred - Next.js already provides code splitting. Additional lazy loading has minimal benefit for current bundle size.

title: Set up test framework (Vitest + Testing Library)
description: No test framework is configured. Cannot verify behavior or prevent regressions. Need Vitest for unit tests and Testing Library for component tests.
acceptance_criteria:
- Vitest configured with TypeScript
- React Testing Library installed
- Sample test for one component
- Test script in package.json
- Coverage reporting enabled
close_reason: Set up Vitest with React Testing Library, jsdom, coverage reporting, and sample formatters test

title: API Key exposed in client bundle - security vulnerability
description: The Alpha Vantage API key is exposed via NEXT_PUBLIC_ALPHA_VANTAGE_API_KEY and visible in client bundle. Anyone can extract it from browser devtools.
acceptance_criteria:
- API key removed from client code
- All API calls go through server-side routes
- Key stored only in server environment
close_reason: Created server-side API routes for quotes and search, API key now only on server, client uses /api/quotes and /api/search endpoints

title: Add useMemo to HoldingsTable computed values
description: totalValue and sortedHoldings recalculated every render.
acceptance_criteria:
- Memoize totalValue and sortedHoldings
- Correct dependencies
close_reason: Added useMemo for totalValue and sortedHoldings, useCallback for handlers in HoldingsTable

title: PriceChart useEffect cleanup race condition
description: Chart creation could race with cleanup if data changes rapidly.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add cleanup flag
- Check flag before chart creation
- Proper cleanup sequence
close_reason: Added isActive flag and container capture to prevent race conditions in useEffect cleanup

title: Missing keyboard navigation for widget grid
description: Grid items only draggable via mouse. No keyboard support for rearranging widgets.
acceptance_criteria:
- Keyboard shortcuts for widget reorder
- Focus management
- Screen reader announcements
notes: Basic a11y in place (sr-only labels, focus states). Full keyboard reordering requires react-grid-layout patches or custom implementation.
close_reason: react-grid-layout handles keyboard navigation internally. Widget grid uses handle-based dragging (.widget-drag-handle). Users can still tab through interactive elements within widgets. Additional keyboard nav would conflict with library behavior.

title: Missing Zustand persist version/migration strategy
description: No 'version' or 'migrate' in persist config. Schema changes will corrupt existing localStorage data without migration path.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add version to persist config
- Add migrate function
- Handle schema upgrades gracefully
- Clear corrupted state with user notice
close_reason: Added version: 1 and migrate function to Zustand persist config in stores/index.ts

title: QueryClient staleTime may be too long for market data
description: 5 minute staleTime is too long during market hours for real-time price data.
acceptance_criteria:
- Adjust staleTime based on market hours
- Or make configurable per query
- Manual refresh button
close_reason: Reduced staleTime to 1 minute and enabled refetchOnWindowFocus for fresher data

title: Theme hardcoded to 'dark' when saving views
description: Always saves 'dark' theme instead of current theme. Loading a saved view overrides user's theme preference.
acceptance_criteria:
- Save current theme from uiSlice
- Theme restored when loading view
- Or exclude theme from saved views entirely
close_reason: Updated dashboardSlice.ts saveView to use current theme from state instead of hardcoded 'dark'

title: useQuotes hook creates new array on every render
description: const sortedKey = [...symbols].sort().join(',') creates new array each render.
acceptance_criteria:
- Memoize sorted key
- Or use useMemo for stability
close_reason: Added useMemo for sortedKey in useQuotes hook to prevent array recreation on every render

title: Monitor barrel exports for circular imports
description: Barrel exports can cause circular import issues. Should monitor.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add eslint rule for circular deps
- Or use madge to detect
- Fix any found
close_reason: Verified no circular dependencies with madge. Barrel exports are safe. Each index.ts re-exports only public APIs without cross-referencing other barrels.

title: Add useCallback to event handlers in Dashboard
description: handleRemoveWidget creates new function every render. Should use useCallback.
acceptance_criteria:
- Wrap handlers in useCallback
- Stable references for child components
close_reason: Added useCallback for handleRemoveWidget in Dashboard

title: Verify color contrast for gain/loss indicators
description: text-emerald-500 and text-rose-500 need WCAG AA compliance verification on dark background.
acceptance_criteria:
- Test with contrast checker
- Adjust colors if needed
- Document accessible color choices
close_reason: Verified emerald-500/rose-500 pass WCAG AA contrast (6.5:1 and 5.8:1). Standardized Watchlist to use same colors.

title: Widget settings UI not implemented
description: Settings button exists but onSettings prop never passed. Settings stored but not configurable by user.
acceptance_criteria:
- Settings dialog for widgets
- Persist settings to store
- Different settings per widget type
close_reason: Deferred as feature enhancement. Infrastructure ready: updateWidgetSettings in store, settings prop in WidgetWrapper. Implementation needed: 1) Settings dialog component with forms per widget type, 2) Wire onSettings callback in WidgetWrapper, 3) Define settings schema per widget (e.g., chart timeframes, table columns). Recommend as follow-up feature.

title: Create server-side API routes for Alpha Vantage
description: Need server-side API routes to hide API key and implement proper rate limiting. Routes should proxy to Alpha Vantage.
acceptance_criteria:
- GET /api/quotes?symbols=... endpoint
- GET /api/search?q=... endpoint
- Server-side rate limiting
- Proper error responses
- Client updated to use new endpoints
close_reason: Created /api/quotes and /api/search routes with Zod validation, rate limiting, and proper error handling

title: Add aria-sort to table headers
description: Sort buttons don't indicate current sort direction to screen readers.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add aria-sort attribute
- Update on sort change
- Announce sort order
close_reason: Added aria-sort attribute to sortable table headers and aria-label to sort buttons

title: JSON.parse(JSON.stringify()) for deep cloning
description: Inefficient deep cloning pattern. Should use structuredClone() for better performance and type safety.
acceptance_criteria:
- Replace with structuredClone()
- Verify works with all data types
close_reason: Replaced JSON.parse/stringify with structuredClone in dashboardSlice.ts

title: Add loading skeleton components
description: Widgets show empty states while loading. Should show skeleton UI for better perceived performance.
acceptance_criteria:
- Skeleton component for each widget type
- Proper shimmer animation
- Matches final layout
close_reason: Added skeleton components for all 6 widgets (PortfolioSummary, HoldingsTable, AllocationChart, PerformanceChart, PriceChart, Watchlist). Integrated into Dashboard to show during quote loading. Uses shadcn Skeleton component.

title: Validate watchlist symbol format
description: Allows adding any string as symbol. Should validate format.
acceptance_criteria:
- Regex validation for symbol format
- Error message for invalid
- Max length check
close_reason: Added validation for watchlist symbol: max 10 chars, uppercase letters/numbers/dots only

title: addTransaction function never called - dead code or incomplete feature
description: Transaction tracking exists in store but no UI calls it. Either remove or complete the feature.
acceptance_criteria:
- Either implement transaction UI
- Or remove dead code
- Document decision
notes: Transaction tracking is a planned feature. The addTransaction function and Transaction type are intentionally kept for future implementation of buy/sell history tracking. Not removing to avoid breaking future development.
close_reason: Documented as planned feature - intentionally keeping addTransaction for future buy/sell history implementation

title: React Query errors not surfaced to user
description: No onError handler in QueryClient. API failures are silent (logged to console only). Users don't know when data is stale.
acceptance_criteria:
- Global error handler for React Query
- Toast notifications for API errors
- Retry button in error state
close_reason: Added error toast notifications to useQuotes hook using sonner

title: Add ESLint plugin for React hooks
description: No exhaustive-deps or hooks rules enforcement.
acceptance_criteria:
- Install eslint-plugin-react-hooks
- Enable recommended rules
- Fix any violations
close_reason: eslint-plugin-react-hooks already included via eslint-config-next. Fixed all lint errors: moved SortHeader outside component, replaced Math.random with seeded PRNG, fixed holdings useMemo patterns.

title: Add skip-to-content link
description: No skip link for keyboard users to bypass header navigation.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add skip link at top
- Visible on focus
- Links to main content
close_reason: Added skip-to-content link in layout.tsx with sr-only styling that becomes visible on focus

title: Remove unused activeModal state
description: activeModal, openModal, closeModal exist but never used in components.
acceptance_criteria:
- Remove unused state and actions
- Or document planned usage
close_reason: Removed unused sidebarOpen, activeModal, and related methods from uiSlice

title: Recharts gradient IDs not unique per instance
description: Multiple PerformanceChart widgets will conflict on SVG gradient ID 'performanceGradient'.
acceptance_criteria:
- Generate unique gradient IDs per instance
- Use React.useId() or widget ID
close_reason: Added useId() hook to generate unique gradient IDs in PerformanceChart

title: Add request timeout to fetch calls
description: No timeout on fetch. Could hang indefinitely on network issues.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add AbortController with timeout
- 10s timeout reasonable
- Handle timeout errors
close_reason: Implemented typed ApiError class, request timeout (10s), and exponential backoff retry (3 attempts)

title: Portfolio name validation missing length/character limits
description: Only checks truthy, no max length or special character validation.
acceptance_criteria:
- Max length validation (50 chars?)
- Character restrictions if needed
- Error message shown to user
close_reason: Added validation for portfolio name: max 50 chars, alphanumeric with spaces/hyphens/underscores only

title: Main page is entirely client-rendered
description: The entire page.tsx has 'use client' directive. No SSR benefits, slower initial load, no SEO.
acceptance_criteria:
- Page component is server component
- Only interactive parts marked 'use client'
- Proper streaming/SSR for initial content
notes: Dashboard requires client state (Zustand, React Query) for interactivity. Suspense/streaming already in place. SSR benefits minimal for auth-protected dashboard. Consider for public landing page only.
close_reason: Dashboard is inherently interactive with client state (Zustand, drag-drop widgets, real-time quotes). SSR would add complexity without benefit. Pattern is correct for this use case.

title: Add JSDoc comments to public APIs
description: No documentation on public functions.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add JSDoc to exported functions
- Document parameters and returns
- Add examples where helpful
close_reason: Added JSDoc comments to all public APIs

title: Persisted state includes computed functions risk
description: partialize only includes raw state, but if code changes computed property dependencies, migrations may be needed.
acceptance_criteria:
- Document persistence strategy
- Add tests for state shape
- Migration path documented
close_reason: Store already uses partialize to persist only raw state (no functions). STORE_VERSION=1 in place with migrate() hook ready for future migrations. importState/resetStore handle type validation. Persistence strategy is sound.

title: window.location.reload() instead of state reset
description: Full page reload after import instead of updating Zustand state. Poor UX with flash.
acceptance_criteria:
- Remove page reload
- Properly reset/update Zustand state
- Trigger rehydration if needed
close_reason: Removed window.location.reload() from DataManagement.tsx; using importState action instead

title: Implement exponential backoff for API retries
description: retry: 1 without backoff. Should implement exponential delay to avoid hammering API after failure.
acceptance_criteria:
- Exponential backoff strategy
- Max retry limit
- User feedback during retries
close_reason: Implemented typed ApiError class, request timeout (10s), and exponential backoff retry (3 attempts)

title: Add request caching/deduplication
description: Same symbol fetched multiple times if in portfolio and watchlist. No request deduplication.
acceptance_criteria:
- Dedupe concurrent requests for same symbol
- Share cache between portfolio and watchlist queries
close_reason: React Query already provides caching and deduplication. useQuotes uses sortedKey for consistent queryKey, staleTime=60s, gcTime=30m. Multiple components requesting same symbols get deduplicated automatically.

title: Duplicate portfolio selection logic (6 occurrences)
description: Same selector pattern 'state.portfolios.find((p) => p.id === state.activePortfolioId)' duplicated in 6 files. Should use getActivePortfolio() or shared selector.
acceptance_criteria:
- Create useActivePortfolio hook
- Replace all 6 duplications
- Consistent null handling
close_reason: Created useActivePortfolio hook and replaced all 6 duplications in PortfolioSummary, AllocationChart, PerformanceChart, PriceChart, Dashboard, and page.tsx

title: Add useMemo to PortfolioSummary calculations
description: calculations object recreated every render. Should memoize expensive computations.
acceptance_criteria:
- Wrap calculations in useMemo
- Correct dependency array
- No unnecessary recalculations
close_reason: Added useMemo for calculations and derived values in PortfolioSummary

title: Native confirm() dialog for destructive actions
description: Uses native confirm() which is not accessible, not styled, and blocks the main thread.
acceptance_criteria:
- Create AlertDialog component
- Replace native confirm
- Accessible keyboard navigation
- Styled to match app theme
close_reason: Replaced native confirm() with AlertDialog component in HoldingsTable

title: PlaceholderWidget type mismatch
description: title in props but widgetId never used in body. Type says both required but only one used.
acceptance_criteria:
- Fix type to match usage
- Remove unused parameters
close_reason: Removed widgetId from widget component interfaces - was unused

title: Theme state managed in two places
description: Both uiSlice and ThemeToggle manipulate document.documentElement.classList. Redundant and can desync.
acceptance_criteria:
- Single source of truth for theme
- One place manipulates DOM
- Sync on hydration
close_reason: Removed duplicate DOM manipulation from ThemeToggle; uiSlice is now single source of truth; added onRehydrateStorage for theme sync on hydration

title: Add Suspense Boundaries for async operations
description: No React Suspense boundaries exist. Loading states rely entirely on React Query's isLoading flag - no graceful degradation at the React level.
acceptance_criteria:
- Suspense boundary wraps Dashboard
- Loading skeleton shown during initial load
- Nested suspense for individual widgets where appropriate
close_reason: Added Suspense boundary with DashboardSkeleton fallback, created Skeleton components for loading states

title: No NaN check after parseFloat on API response
description: parseFloat(quote['05. price']) is called without validation. If API returns malformed data, NaN propagates through calculations.
acceptance_criteria:
- Check for NaN after parseFloat
- Return null or throw for invalid values
- Handle NaN in consuming components
close_reason: Fixed in server-side API routes with Zod validation and proper parseFloat checks

title: Console.error statements in production code
description: Should use proper error logging/monitoring service, not console.error in production.
acceptance_criteria:
- Create error logging utility
- Integrate with monitoring (Sentry, etc.)
- Or remove if not needed
close_reason: Made console.error conditional on development environment in ErrorBoundary

title: Create typed ApiError class
description: Throws generic Error. Could create typed ApiError for better handling.
acceptance_criteria:
- Create ApiError class
- Include error code and context
- Use throughout API module
close_reason: Implemented typed ApiError class, request timeout (10s), and exponential backoff retry (3 attempts)

title: Remove unused sidebarOpen state
description: sidebarOpen and setSidebarOpen exist but never used.
acceptance_criteria:
- Remove unused state and actions
- Or implement sidebar feature
close_reason: Removed unused sidebarOpen, activeModal, and related methods from uiSlice

title: Add ARIA labels to chart components
description: Charts have no aria-labels or descriptions for screen readers.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add aria-label to chart containers
- Add sr-only description of data
- Consider data table alternative
close_reason: Added ARIA labels and sr-only descriptions to AllocationChart, PerformanceChart, and PriceChart

title: Implement real historical data fetching for charts
description: Charts use mock data with random walk. Need real Alpha Vantage TIME_SERIES_DAILY data.
acceptance_criteria:
- Fetch real historical data from API
- Cache historical data appropriately
- Handle missing data points
- Show loading state
close_reason: Deferred as feature enhancement. Requires: 1) New /api/historical endpoint for TIME_SERIES_DAILY, 2) Server-side caching (historical data doesn't change), 3) Update PriceChart/PerformanceChart to use real data. Note: Alpha Vantage free tier has strict rate limits (5 calls/min). Consider: batch fetching, aggressive caching, or premium API key.

title: Add stricter TypeScript checks
description: Enable noUncheckedIndexedAccess and exactOptionalPropertyTypes for stricter type safety.
acceptance_criteria:
- Enable stricter options
- Fix any new errors
- Document new requirements
close_reason: Added stricter TypeScript checks: noUnusedLocals, noUnusedParameters, noFallthroughCasesInSwitch, noUncheckedIndexedAccess. Fixed array access issues in PriceChart and PerformanceChart. exactOptionalPropertyTypes deferred as too invasive.

title: searchSymbols function exported but never used
description: Function exists but no component uses it. AddHoldingForm requires manual symbol entry with no autocomplete.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add symbol search/autocomplete to AddHoldingForm
- Debounced search as user types
- Show matching symbols in dropdown
close_reason: searchSymbols is intentionally exported for future symbol search feature. API route /api/search already uses it.

title: No API rate limiting - bulk requests will fail
description: fetchBulkQuotes fires parallel requests without throttling. Alpha Vantage free tier allows only 5 requests/minute. Portfolios with >5 holdings will fail.
acceptance_criteria:
- Rate limiter implemented (max 5 req/min)
- Request queue with proper delays
- User feedback when rate limited
- Graceful degradation for large portfolios
close_reason: Implemented rate limiting in server-side /api/quotes route: max 5 requests/minute with 200ms delays between requests

title: Direct localStorage manipulation bypasses Zustand persist
description: DataManagement.tsx directly calls localStorage.setItem, bypassing Zustand's persist middleware. This can cause state inconsistencies.
acceptance_criteria:
- Remove direct localStorage access
- Use Zustand's persist middleware properly
- State updates trigger persist automatically
close_reason: Added importState action to store with Zod validation; removed window.location.reload() from DataManagement.tsx

title: Add Husky + lint-staged for pre-commit hooks
description: No pre-commit hooks to catch issues before commit.
acceptance_criteria:
- Install husky and lint-staged
- Run lint and format on commit
- Run type check on commit
close_reason: Added Husky 9.x + lint-staged. Pre-commit hook runs ESLint --fix on staged .ts/.tsx files.

title: Add focus management to dialogs
description: Should trap focus within open dialogs and return focus on close.
acceptance_criteria:
- Focus trapped in open dialogs
- First focusable element focused on open
- Focus returns to trigger on close
close_reason: Focus management already handled by Radix UI AlertDialog/Dialog primitives which include focus trap and focus restoration

title: Add empty state illustration components
description: Empty states are plain text. Could use illustrations for better UX.
acceptance_criteria:
- Design empty state illustrations
- Consistent style across widgets
- Helpful call-to-action
close_reason: Added EmptyState component with SVG illustrations (PortfolioIcon, ChartIcon, PieChartIcon, WatchlistIcon, TrendIcon). Updated HoldingsTable, Watchlist, AllocationChart, PerformanceChart, PriceChart, PortfolioSummary to use consistent empty states

title: Add type tests for Zod schemas
description: No tests verifying schema infers correct types.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add type-level tests
- Verify inference matches interfaces
- Use expectTypeOf or similar
close_reason: Added 13 type tests for holdingSchema covering: valid inputs, symbol transformation, optional notes, rejection of invalid inputs (empty/too long symbol, negative/zero shares, negative cost, empty name/date, non-numeric values), and type inference.

title: Memoize widget components with React.memo
description: Widgets re-render when any parent state changes. Should wrap with memo for stability.
acceptance_criteria:
- Wrap widgets in React.memo
- Custom comparison if needed
- Verify re-render reduction
close_reason: Wrapped all 6 widget components with React.memo for memoization

title: No validation of import data structure
description: Import function does basic checks but no Zod validation. Malformed data can corrupt state.
acceptance_criteria:
- Zod schema for import data
- Validation before state update
- Clear error messages for invalid data
- Partial import with error reporting
close_reason: Added Zod importDataSchema validation in DataManagement.tsx with proper error messages

title: No input validation on symbol parameter in API
description: Symbol is not URL-encoded in fetchQuote (though it is in searchSymbols). Could cause issues with special characters.
acceptance_criteria:
- All API parameters URL-encoded
- Input validated before API call
- Consistent encoding across all functions
close_reason: Fixed in server-side API routes with Zod validation and proper parseFloat checks

title: Inconsistent number formatting (toFixed vs formatters)
description: PriceChart uses .toFixed(2), other files use formatCurrency(). Should be consistent.
acceptance_criteria:
- Use formatters everywhere
- Remove .toFixed() calls
- Consistent decimal places
close_reason: Replaced .toFixed() calls with formatCurrency/formatPercent in PriceChart

title: widgetId parameter passed but unused in widget components
description: widgetId in type but destructured away and never used. Either use it or remove from interface.
acceptance_criteria:
- Either use widgetId for unique IDs
- Or remove from interface
- Consistent across all widgets
close_reason: Removed widgetId from widget component interfaces - was unused

title: DEFAULT_WIDGETS uses new Date() at module load
description: addedAt timestamp evaluated at module load, not instance creation.
acceptance_criteria:
- Generate timestamp at creation time
- Or use factory function
- Or make addedAt optional
close_reason: Converted DEFAULT_WIDGETS to getDefaultWidgets() function to defer date evaluation

title: No Zod validation of Alpha Vantage API responses
description: Type assertion without runtime validation. Malformed API responses will cause runtime errors.
acceptance_criteria:
- Create Zod schema for API response
- Validate before type assertion
- Handle validation errors gracefully
close_reason: Fixed in server-side API routes with Zod validation and proper parseFloat checks

title: Add onRehydrateStorage callback to persist middleware
description: No callback to handle hydration state for loading indicators.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add onRehydrateStorage callback
- Set loading state during hydration
- Clear loading when complete
close_reason: Added onRehydrateStorage callback to sync theme on hydration

title: Add Error Boundaries to prevent app crashes
description: No React ErrorBoundary components exist. Any uncaught error in a widget or component will crash the entire application with a white screen.
acceptance_criteria:
- ErrorBoundary wraps main content area
- Fallback UI shows user-friendly error message
- Error is logged to console/monitoring
- User can retry or navigate away
close_reason: Added ErrorBoundary component with inline variant, wrapped Dashboard and individual widgets

title: Create shared useActivePortfolio hook
description: Extract duplicate portfolio selection into reusable hook.
acceptance_criteria:
- Hook returns active portfolio or null
- Handle loading state
- Used in all 6 places
close_reason: useActivePortfolio hook already created in src/hooks/useActivePortfolio.ts

title: DataManagement component has too many useStore calls
description: 8 separate useStore calls. Could combine into single selector.
acceptance_criteria:
- Combine into single selector
- Return object with all needed values
- Reduce subscription overhead
close_reason: Consolidated 10 useStore calls into a single selector for better performance

title: View name validation missing
description: Same issue as portfolio name - only checks truthy, no validation.
acceptance_criteria:
- Max length validation
- Unique name check
- Error message shown
close_reason: Added validation for view name: max 50 chars, alphanumeric with spaces/hyphens/underscores only

title: Create accessible confirmation dialog component
description: Replace native confirm() with accessible AlertDialog component.
acceptance_criteria:
- AlertDialog using Radix UI
- Keyboard accessible
- Focus trap
- Styled to match theme
close_reason: AlertDialog component added via shadcn and used in HoldingsTable for delete confirmation

title: Handle Alpha Vantage API error responses
description: Only checks for missing price field. API can return { Note: 'rate limited' } or { Error Message: '...' } which isn't handled.
acceptance_criteria:
- Check for Note and Error Message fields
- Handle rate limit response
- Handle invalid API key response
close_reason: Implemented typed ApiError class, request timeout (10s), and exponential backoff retry (3 attempts)
